short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thread is the AI-powered assistant for Sales teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thread is a smart assistant app that helps sales teams work more effectively together. Thread accelerates sales cycles and powers sellers and their active collaborators. Sellers can create internal threads (deal collaboration between Sales and Customer Success, Marketing, others) and external threads (sales and post-sales collaboration and relationship management with customers and partners). The Tact Assistant provides Natural language assistance in Thread, pulling information across systems including Salesforce or other CRMs, LinkedIn, email, and calendar, in a single timeline. Sales teams can engage in real time via shared content, document annotations, audio/video snippets, and task assignments.
